name: hh-auto-respond-eda
description: Event-Driven Architecture для автооткликов на вакансии HH.ru

scripts.db:reset: bun run db:down && docker volume rm hh-auto-respond-postgres-data || true && bun run db:up && sleep 3 && bun run db:push && bun run seed
scripts.setup: bun install && bun run db:up && sleep 3 && bun run db:push && bun run seed
scripts.clean: bun run db:down && docker volume rm hh-auto-respond-postgres-data || true && rm -rf node_modules bun.lockb src/db/migrations
